name: CloudCone VPS 信息面板
desc: 查询并显示CloudCone VPS 的信息 CloudCone不提供VPS API，需在Cloudflare Workers上部署此API后端: https://github.com/RS0485/CloudCone-API 运行参数通过脚本进行设置：$persistentStore.write('{ "email": "rs0485@example.com", "password": "hellopass", "vpsid": "12345", "api_addr": "https://cloudcone-api.example.workers.dev" }', "cloudcone-vps-options"); $done({settings: "ok"})

name: 微博去广告
